action.p: This is a significant upgrade of the CEA server to include UWS support and to update the schema - see the bugzilla ticket (and dependencies for more detail) Some other important changes include

ul.li: build with maven 2 with centralized base project again.
Java 1.5 is the minimum supported version
Spring used as the IOC container
project reorganized so that there is only single CEC - it can be configured to be serve commandline, http and javaclass applications simultaneously
The project is refactored to avoid relying on the maven-base project.
Classes specific to the Java-class-application server have been moved to a separate sub-project. These classes are no longer available in the server core.
